tables.name: lenses_cosmoshub_apr
tables.description: This table provides APR data for assets on the Cosmos blockchain, offering insights into the rewarding activities and rates within the Cosmos network. APR (Annual Percentage Rate) is calculated based on the rolling averages of the past day, week, and month.

columns.name: labels
columns.description: Unique identifiers for project labels and categorizations

columns.name: symbol
columns.description: Token symbols associated with specific blockchain assets

columns.name: mean_apr_1d_rolling
columns.description: Seven-day Simple Moving Average of daily Average Rate of Return

columns.name: mean_apr_7d_rolling
columns.description: Thirty-day Simple Moving Average of weekly Average Rate of Return

columns.name: mean_apr_30d_rolling
columns.description: Simple Moving Average of monthly Average Rate of Return

tables.name: lenses_cosmoshub_atom_price
tables.description: This table contains the current and historical prices of assets within the Cosmos ecosystem. It provides a detailed view of the price fluctuations of these assets over time, allowing users to analyze market trends and patterns.

columns.name: time_minutes
columns.description: Time elapsed since block proposal, in minutes.

columns.name: asset
columns.description: Token or asset (e.g., ATOM, OSMO) being traded or used.

columns.name: price_in_usdc
columns.description: Current price of asset in USD coin (USDC) per unit.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when data was ingested or recorded.

tables.name: lenses_cosmoshub_chain_daily_revenue
tables.description: This dataset tracks daily revenue from various chains within the Cosmos ecosystem, providing insights into the network's overall financial performance. The daily revenue is calculated from transaction fees and ICS fees.

columns.name: date
columns.description: Timestamp of each daily snapshot of blockchain chain performance

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each Cosmos blockchain network instance

columns.name: txn_fees
columns.description: Total fees collected from all transactions within each chain daily

columns.name: lsd_fees
columns.description: Total fees collected from Liquidity Staking Deposits (LSD) on each chain daily

columns.name: ics_fees
columns.description: Total fees collected from ICS (Inter-Chain Secure) protocol interactions daily

tables.name: lenses_cosmoshub_chain_hourly_revenue
tables.description: The cosmoshub_chain_hourly_revenue table provides data on the total revenue generated by Cosmos blockchain transactions on an hourly basis, including transaction fees, liquidity staking derivatives (LSD) fees, and Inter-Chain Service (ICS) fees. This data offers insights into the economic activity within the Cosmos ecosystem.

columns.name: date
columns.description: Date of snapshot, typically in ISO 8601 format, representing a specific block time

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the Cosmos blockchain network (e.g., Cosmos Hub, Osmosis)

columns.name: txn_fees
columns.description: Total fees collected for transaction processing within the chain, aggregated hourly

columns.name: lsd_fees
columns.description: Fees associated with transactions processed using LCD (Liquid Staking Derivative) protocol

columns.name: ics_fees
columns.description: Fees associated with Inter-Blockchain Communication (IBC) transactions within the chain

tables.name: lenses_cosmoshub_ibc_flow
tables.description: This table provides insights into IBC flows, which enable the transfer of assets between Cosmos-based blockchains. It captures the key metrics related to these flows.

columns.name: date
columns.description: Timestamp of the event occurrence in blockchain network

columns.name: stride
columns.description: Elapsed time interval between events in a specific blockchain context

columns.name: persistence
columns.description: Indication of transaction finality or commitment in blockchain

columns.name: cosmoshub
columns.description: Identifier of the Cosmos Hub or related blockchain network

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Time when the event data was ingested or processed

tables.name: lenses_cosmoshub_liquid_staking
tables.description: This table provides an overview of liquid staking data from the Cosmos ecosystem, offering insights into the distribution and dynamics of staked tokens across various Cosmos hubs.

columns.name: date
columns.description: The date on which the liquid staking data was recorded.

columns.name: stride
columns.description: Represents the progress or measure of staking activity over time, providing insights into the growth and maintenance of liquidity in the Cosmos ecosystem.

columns.name: persistence
columns.description: Indicates the level of commitment from validators to participate in liquid staking, reflecting their willingness to maintain their positions in the network.

columns.name: cosmoshub
columns.description: Represents a specific hub within the Cosmos network, providing a focal point for liquid staking activities and enabling users to target specific nodes for participation.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the system, reflecting the most recent point at which the data was processed and updated.

tables.name: lenses_cosmoshub_liquid_staking_flow
tables.description: This table provides an overview of the liquid staking flow for the Cosmos Hub network, helping users understand the dynamics of asset distribution and movement within the ecosystem. It offers insights into total and top inflows, outflows, and corresponding transactions.

columns.name: time_in_hours
columns.description: Elapsed time since last data ingestion in hours

columns.name: total_inflow
columns.description: Cumulative Blockchain native token value received by the validator

columns.name: top_inflow
columns.description: Highest single inflow value as native blockchain token

columns.name: top_inflow_tx_id
columns.description: Transaction ID that delivered the top inflow to the validator

columns.name: total_outflow
columns.description: Cumulative Blockchain native token value sent by the validator

columns.name: top_outflow
columns.description: Highest single outflow value as native blockchain token

columns.name: top_outflow_tx_id
columns.description: Transaction ID that processed the top outflow from the validator

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Unix timestamp when the data was ingested into the dataset

tables.name: lenses_cosmoshub_staking_flow
tables.description: This table provides a high-level overview of the Cosmos Ecosystem's staking flow, including total and top inflows and outflows. Staking flow is essential for the operation and maintenance of the Cosmos Hub.

columns.name: time_in_hours
columns.description: Elasped time between staking flow records in hours

columns.name: total_inflow
columns.description: Total value received by validators via Cosmos staking

columns.name: top_inflow
columns.description: Highest staking inflow received by a validator

columns.name: top_inflow_tx_id
columns.description: Transaction ID of the top staking inflow transaction

columns.name: total_outflow
columns.description: Total value withdrawn by validators via Cosmos staking

columns.name: top_outflow
columns.description: Highest staking outflow made by a validator

columns.name: top_outflow_tx_id
columns.description: Transaction ID of the top staking outflow transaction

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when data was ingested from the Cosmos blockchain network

tables.name: lenses_osmosis_bonded_liquidity_flow
tables.description: This table provides information on the flow of bonded liquidity in the Osmosis network, offering insights into the inflow and outflow of liquidity across various time periods.

columns.name: time_in_hours
columns.description: Elapsed time in hours since the bonded liquidity flow began

columns.name: total_inflow
columns.description: Cumulative in-flow value of liquidity from bonded pool participants

columns.name: top_inflow
columns.description: Maximum in-flow value of a single bonded liquidity participant

columns.name: top_inflow_tx_id
columns.description: Hash of the transaction causing the maximum in-flow

columns.name: total_outflow
columns.description: Cumulative out-flow value of liquidity from bonded pool participants

columns.name: top_outflow
columns.description: Maximum out-flow value of a single bonded liquidity participant

columns.name: top_outflow_tx_id
columns.description: Hash of the transaction causing the maximum out-flow

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the data was ingested into the database

tables.name: lenses_osmosis_chain_hourly_revenue
tables.description: This table provides an hourly breakdown of the revenue generated by the Osmosis blockchain, highlighting its transactional dynamics and fee collection patterns. The data offers valuable insights into the chain's revenue streams across various categories.

columns.name: time_in_hours
columns.description: Amount of time elapsed in hours at the time of data collection.

columns.name: tx_fees
columns.description: Total fees collected from executed transactions in the Osmosis chain.

columns.name: protorev
columns.description: Cumulative PROTO rewards issued on the Osmosis chain per hour.

columns.name: swap_fees
columns.description: Fees generated from on-chain swap transactions on the Osmosis chain.

columns.name: taker_fees
columns.description: Fees earned by takers from on-chain interaction on the Osmosis chain.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the data is ingested into the system from the blockchain.

tables.name: lenses_osmosis_concentration_of_activity
tables.description: This stream represents the Concentration of Activity (COA) of Osmosis on the Cosmos blockchain ecosystem. It measures the distribution of activity across the network, providing insights into the market dynamics and executing talent.

columns.name: day
columns.description: Date of data processing within the context of blockchain networks

columns.name: COA
columns.description: Concentration of activity, quantifying overall network engagement metrics

tables.name: lenses_osmosis_daily_active_users
tables.description: Daily active users in the Osmosis network. This table contains information about the daily activities of users on the Osmosis blockchain, from blockchains of the cosmos ecosystem.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp of the block when the transaction was processed on the blockchain

columns.name: sender
columns.description: Public address of the sender initiating the transaction or event

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the data is ingested into the blockchain analytics system

tables.name: lenses_osmosis_daily_active_users_count
tables.description: Daily count of unique active users in the Osmosis network, providing insight into the ecosystem's growth and activity levels. This data is specific to the Cosmos ecosystem, giving a glimpse into the adoption and usage patterns of Osmosis.

columns.name: day
columns.description: Date of daily active users count measurement on Osmosis network

columns.name: unique_users
columns.description: Count of distinct users actively using Osmosis on a daily basis

tables.name: lenses_osmosis_ibc_flow
tables.description: This table tracks IBC (Inter- Blockchain Communication) flows in the Osmosis ecosystem, providing insights into token movement between different chains.

columns.name: time_in_hours
columns.description: Timestamp in hours since block validation occurrence

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: Unique identifier of a Cosmos blockchain network

columns.name: total_inflow
columns.description: Cumulative value of inflows across the blockchain network

columns.name: top_inflow
columns.description: Largest inflow amount during the measurement period

columns.name: top_inflow_tx_id
columns.description: Transaction identifier of the top inflow transaction

columns.name: total_outflow
columns.description: Cumulative value of outflows across the blockchain network

columns.name: top_outflow
columns.description: Largest outflow amount during the measurement period

columns.name: top_outflow_tx_id
columns.description: Transaction identifier of the top outflow transaction

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when data was ingested into the system

tables.name: lenses_osmosis_liquidity_flow
tables.description: This table provides an overview of the liquidity flow on the Osmosis blockchain, offering insights into the amount of assets flowing in and out of the network over time. It helps track the evolution of liquidity and the activity on the protocol.

columns.name: time_in_hours
columns.description: Timestamp elapsed since Osmosis liquidity flow events, measured in hours

columns.name: total_inflow
columns.description: Cumulative value of incoming assets to Osmosis liquidity pool

columns.name: top_inflow
columns.description: Single largest value of incoming assets to Osmosis liquidity pool

columns.name: top_inflow_tx_id
columns.description: Transaction ID of top inflow event in Osmosis liquidity pool

columns.name: total_outflow
columns.description: Cumulative value of outgoing assets from Osmosis liquidity pool

columns.name: top_outflow
columns.description: Single largest value of outgoing assets from Osmosis liquidity pool

columns.name: top_outflow_tx_id
columns.description: Transaction ID of top outflow event in Osmosis liquidity pool

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when data was ingested into data processing system

tables.name: lenses_osmosis_new_users_ratio
tables.description: This table tracks the growth and engagement of users in the Osmosis blockchain, providing insights into the adoption rate of the platform. By analyzing new and returning users, we can identify trends and patterns that can inform product development and marketing strategies.

columns.name: new_users
columns.description: Number of unique new user addresses in the Osmosis network over time.

columns.name: returning_users
columns.description: Number of unique returning user addresses in the Osmosis network over time.

columns.name: new_users_ratio
columns.description: Ratio of new users to total users in the Osmosis network over time.

columns.name: day
columns.description: Timestamp in days, representing distinct time intervals for Osmosis network activity.

tables.name: lenses_osmosis_osmo_price
tables.description: This table contains historical price data for OSMOs (Osmosis tokens) fetched from the Cosmos ecosystem, providing a comprehensive snapshot of OSMO price movements. The data is useful for analysts and traders seeking to track OSMO market trends and patterns.

columns.name: time_minutes
columns.description: Time elapsed since epoch in minutes, conveying temporal data within blockchain

columns.name: asset
columns.description: ISO 4217 standard currency codes or symbols for digital assets within Cosmos ecosystem

columns.name: price_in_usdc
columns.description: Current value of assets in United States Dollars according to market rates

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp of when the data was ingested into the system from blockchain networks

tables.name: lenses_osmosis_osmo_top_stakeholders
tables.description: This table showcases the top stakeholders in the Osmosis network, demonstrating their level of investment and commitment to the Cosmos ecosystem. The data highlights the key players in the Osmosis economy, providing insight into their staked resources.

columns.name: date
columns.description: Date of the stake balance snapshot in UTC format

columns.name: address
columns.description: Public key or wallet address performing this stake action

columns.name: staked_amount
columns.description: Total amount of OSMO staked by this address at this date

columns.name: bonded_amount
columns.description: Amount of staked OSMO currently bonded for validation

columns.name: liquid_amount
columns.description: Amount of staked OSMO available for withdrawal as needed

tables.name: lenses_osmosis_returning_users_ratio
tables.description: This table provides an overview of the ratio of new users who return to the Osmosis network over time. It helps to analyze user engagement and retention within the Cosmos ecosystem.

columns.name: new_users_ratio
columns.description: Proportion of net new users in Osmosis ecosystem over a given time period.

columns.name: day
columns.description: Continuous date, representing the time scope for new_users_ratio calculation (UTC).

tables.name: lenses_osmosis_staking_flow
tables.description: This table provides an overview of the staking flow across the Cosmos ecosystem, displaying key metrics responsible for the change in the token supply over time.

columns.name: time_in_hours
columns.description: Timestamp offset in hours since epoch, representing time elapsed in blockchain

columns.name: total_inflow
columns.description: Cumulative inflow of Osmosis staking rewards over a given time period

columns.name: top_inflow
columns.description: Largest Osmosis staking reward amount flowing into an address or validator

columns.name: top_inflow_tx_id
columns.description: Transaction ID of the top inflow transaction

columns.name: total_outflow
columns.description: Cumulative outflow of Osmosis staking rewards from a validator or address

columns.name: top_outflow
columns.description: Largest Osmosis staking reward amount flowing out of a validator or address

columns.name: top_outflow_tx_id
columns.description: Transaction ID of the top outflow transaction

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp of data ingestion into the analytics system, in seconds since epoch

tables.name: lenses_osmosis_superfluid_staking_flow
tables.description: This table provides a summary of the osmosis superfluid staking flow, offering insights into the amount of tokens flowing in and out of this staking mechanism within the cosmos ecosystem. It showcases the overall and top inflows and outflows of tokens, providing a comprehensive view of the staking dynamics.

columns.name: time_in_hours
columns.description: Elapsed time from epoch in hours

columns.name: total_inflow
columns.description: Cumulative total incoming superfluid staking balance

columns.name: top_inflow
columns.description: Largest single incoming superfluid staking balance

columns.name: top_inflow_tx_id
columns.description: Transaction ID of top inflow superfluid staking balance

columns.name: total_outflow
columns.description: Cumulative total outgoing superfluid staking balance

columns.name: top_outflow
columns.description: Largest single outgoing superfluid staking balance

columns.name: top_outflow_tx_id
columns.description: Transaction ID of top outflow superfluid staking balance

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: Time data was ingested into database in database-native format

tables.name: lenses_osmosis_trading_flow
tables.description: This dataset provides trading volume and pool information for the Osmosis blockchain, offering insights into the liquidity and market activity within the Cosmos ecosystem.

columns.name: time_in_hours
columns.description: Elapsed time between transaction and current block in hours

columns.name: pool_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for Osmosis liquidity pool

columns.name: volume_in_usd
columns.description: Total transaction volume in US dollars

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: Transaction identifier for Osmosis cross-chain trading flow

columns.name: max_volume_in_usd
columns.description: Maximum single transaction volume in US dollars
